title: Message Chunk Decoder
description: Split a string into chunks of size k. Reverse even-numbered chunks (0, 2, 4, ...), leave odd-numbered chunks as-is, then join and output the result.

method_signatures.java: public static String decodeMessage(String s, int k)
method_signatures.python: def decode_message(s: str, k: int) -> str
method_signatures.cpp: std::string decodeMessage(const std::string& s, int k)

input_format: Line 1: string s. Line 2: integer k.

sample_tests.explanation: Chunks ABC, DEF, GH -> reverse ABC and GH.
